goal.ch: 智慧財產權的發展與科技社會的進步有關，而智慧權法被視為是知識經濟時代的基礎法律，包括著作權法、營業祕密法、專利法、商標法及相關法律。本課程從社會生活與法律實務探討智慧財產權與社會發展關係，對有心學習科技法律與投入科技、著作產業、商場競爭的同學，將能建立起基本的認識。
goal.en:
"First, the teaching objectives:
Intellectual property development and progress of science and technology community, whereas the wisdom rights law is regarded as the legal basis for the knowledge economy era, including copyright law, trade secret law, patent law, trademark law and related laws. This course examines the relationship between intellectual property rights and social development, social life and legal practice, determined to study science and technology to legal and investment in technological, book industry, business competition the students will be able to establish a basic understanding."

outline.ch:
1、課程介紹
2、智慧財產權架構與
現代社會變遷
3、智慧財產權與基本
法律概念
4、著作權：人格權與
財產權
5、著作權：著作人、
讓與及授權
6、著作權的限制/合理
使用、侵權與救濟
7、著作侵權個案探討
8、商標、品牌與行銷
9、商標法主要規範、
侵權與救濟
10、商標與網域名稱的
衝突與爭議
11、商標侵權個案探討
12、專利研發與產業競
爭力
13、專利法規範
14、專利管理與法律對
策
15、專利侵權與救濟
16、營業秘密法規範與
經濟間諜
17、侵害營業秘密個案
探討
18、期末考
上課方式及課程要求：
每一單元原則上以一至二週為講授與討論時間，學期中分組報告，且必須閱讀報紙資
訊、相關新聞與法院判決，以連結現代生活與法律。
outline.en:
"1. Course introduction
2. Intellectual property rights structure and modern social changes
3. Intellectual property rights and basic legal concepts
4. Copyright: Personality and Property Rights
5. Copyright: Author, Assignment and Authorization
6. Restrictions on Copyright / Fair Use, Infringement and Relief
7. Cases of infringement of writings
8. Trademarks, branding and marketing
9. Major Trademark Law, Infringement and Relief
10. Conflicts and disputes between trademarks and domain names
11. Trademark infringement case study
12. Patent R & D and Industrial Competitiveness
13. Patent Law
14. Patent Management and Legal Countermeasures
15. Patent Infringement and Relief
16. Trade secret law and economic espionage
17. Case Study on Infringement of Trade Secrets
18. Final examinations"

textbook.ch: 徐振雄，智慧財產權概論，台北：新文京，2022年。
textbook.en: Xu Zhenxiong, intellectual property rights introduction, Taipei: New Bunkyo, 2022.

gradMethod.ch: 出缺席、提問及討論情況30％、期中報告30％、期末考試40％
gradMethod.en: "Out of the interview, 30% of the questions and discussion, of the study process files, 30% of the interim report, 40%"

officeHour.en: after classmake an appointment with teacher
